comment.author: Sean
comment.text: Madam President Clinton! all day long! send psycho trump packing possibly to Russia! lol

replies.author: Allyson
replies.text: Yeah, we need more Clinton Uranium sales to Putin so he can end us once and for all...sounds like a plan!!

replies.author: Sean
replies.text: Allyson and that's Madam President Clinton! get use to it!! lol
